mapper.insert: insert into USER (ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, REGISTERED_AT, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, LOCK_VERSION, DELETED_FLG) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{registeredAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lockVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update USER set LOGIN_ID = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, REGISTERED_AT = #{registeredAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIRST_NAME = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_NAME = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOCK_VERSION = #{lockVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELETED_FLG = #{deletedFlg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, REGISTERED_AT, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, LOCK_VERSION, DELETED_FLG from USER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, REGISTERED_AT, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, UPDATED_AT, CREATED_AT, LOCK_VERSION, DELETED_FLG from USER
